casaDeTaipa.name: Casa de Taipa
about: The <u>Casa de Taipa</u> represents the originality and identity of the northeastern Brazilian people.
With walls made by hand from clay, it provides a cozy sensation with a pleasant atmosphere.
The famous Casa de Taipa in <u>Vila do Sertão</u> is one of the most visited spots by tourists who come to Poço de José de Moura for unforgettable experiences of our traditions.
The house holds objects and various items once used by sertanejos in the past, which today serve as memories.
The house also offers coffee made on a wood-burning stove and cakes baked in a clay oven. Pot water and wooden benches for chatting.
Visitors to the Casa de Taipa have an <u>unforgettable experience</u>.

about.title: About
about.text: Acervus is a company focused on creating digital archives, combining historical preservation and technology to modernize museums, memorials, public and private collections in an accessible and interactive way to the public.
